name: European Small Volume Car Manufacturers Alliance
goal: ESCA – the European Small Volume Car Manufacturers Alliance – is a pan-European association comprising independent small volume car manufacturers (SVMs) based in the EU. Small volume manufacturers are those that manufacture fewer than 10 000 new cars (registered in the EU) per annum. The members of ESCA are key contributors to the European automotive industry, in terms of technology, innovation, employment and diversity.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Environment, Single market, Transport
euInitiatives: ESCA follows the EU policies in the area of emissions, competitiveness, trade and vehicle safety.
